content.rendered:
Directed by Todd Field

Written by Todd Field

Star Cate Blanchett(Lydia Tár). Noémie Merlant(Francesca Lentini). Adam Gopnik(Adam Gopnik). Marc-Martin Straub(Tailor #1). Egon Brandstetter(Tailor #2). Ylva Pollak(Tailor’s Assistant #1). Natalie Ponudic(Tailor’s Assistant #2). Sylvia Flote(Krista Taylor). Sydney Lemmon(Whitney Reese). Mark Strong(Elliot Kaplan). Nicolas Hopchet(Aldo). Zethphan D. Smith-Gneist(Max (as Zethphan Smith-Gneist)). Kitty Watson(Olive Kerr). Alec Baldwin(Self). Jessica Hansen(Self). Nina Hoss(Sharon Goodnow). Mila Bogojevic(Petra). Alma Löhr(Johanna). Sophie Kauer(Olga Metkina). Allan Corduner(Sebastian Brix). Dorothea Plans Casal(Gosia Proboz). Fabian Dirr(Knut Braun). Julian Glover(Andris Davis). Christian Höcherl(First Trumpet). Jan Wolf(Harald). Peter Hering(Christian). Artjom Gilz(Karl). Han Lai(Tanya). Andreas Jentzsch(Magazine Vendor). Daniel Söhner(Waiter). Tilla Kratochwil(Eleanor). Marie-Lou Sellem(Britta Menges). Marie-Anne Fliegel(Angela Goodnow). André Röhner(Testimonial Recordist). Lydia Schamschula(Lina Greff). Alexandra Montag(Francesca’s Landlord). Chalee Sricharoen(Shaman). Rose Knox-Peebles(Eleanor’s Mother). Frank Röth(Tar’s Personal Physician). Normann Höhne(Undertaker #1 (as Norman Höhne)). Sven Rothe(Undertaker #2). Jasmine Leung(Laura Kim). Johann von Bülow(Male Board Member #1). Oliver Mills(Male Board Member #2). Xenia Assenza(Flight Attendent). Johanne Murdock(Taylor Family Counsel). Sam Douglas(Marty Singer). Burkhard Nitsch(Elevator Operator). Christoph Tomanek(Anna’s Husband). Sarah Bauerett(Estate Agent). Murali Perumal(NYC Livery Driver). Vincent Riotta(Cory Berg). Vivian Full(Kristine Ling). Ed White(Jake Russell). Lucie Pohl(Shannon Jones). Lee R. Sellars(Tony Tarr (as Lee Sellars)). Ian Gallego(Uniformed Guard). Joy Villanueva(MPO Woman). Aldrin Poblete(MPO Assistant #1). Froilan Japano(MPO Assistant #1). Pattarawadee Thiwwatpakorn(Shirley). Parami Mingmitpatanakun(Cirio). Prapruttam Khumchat(Concierge). Jevimary de Guia(Spa Receptionist). Kenneth Won(Stage Manager). An Cerne(Julliard Octet). Wenteng Chang(Julliard Octet). Songha Choi(Julliard Octet). Rucheng Fan(Julliard Octet). Christopher Lindner(Julliard Octet). Sarah Martin(Julliard Octet). Levin Petersen(Julliard Octet). Qu Yunrui(Julliard Octet)

Language English. German. Filipino. French

Producers Cate Blanchett. Sebastian Fahr-Brix. Todd Field. Phil Hunt. Stephen Kelliher. Scott Lambert. Francesca Lentini. Marcus Loges. Chris Lowenstein. Alexandra Milchan. Compton Ross. David L. Schiff. Uwe Schott. Nigel Wooll

Production Focus Features. Standard Film Company. EMJAG Productions
